GitHub Finder

about this website / app

GitHub Finder is website/App that lets third party users look up existed github profiles from the original github website, and look up available information about them. the profiles have different layout styles then the original website. this website/app does NOT have it's own data-base, I used github API to collect all the data about the users.

Technologies used: React Hooks, Context, GitHub API, Axios,

Let's work on your next project!

Lyrics-Keys

about this website / app

Lyrics-Keys is my first project I ever built. The idea behind this website is to let artists and musicians come together and share their music videos and the lyrics to their songs. this website does NOT have it's own data base, and neither third party API. but does include its own it's own server and functional END POINTS. the website is restful and until today it's one of my favorite projects i've done. just because of the fact that this was my first project EVER ... and I feel like I've done good, so if music it's your thing feel free to Check this one out.

Technologies: React, Node, Express, Axios, Git

Let's work on your next project!

TripLan

about this website / app

TripLan is a restful website that helps users that are currently over the road to keep track of their miles, expenses, routes and more! this project HAVE it's own data base & server, functional END POINTS and few more Technologies that I had to learn on my own. the reason why I choose to build this website as my personal project was my previous trucking career that I had. and I feel like this is a good transition for me as a developer. being able to understand better the mind of the user.

Technologies: React, Redux, Node, Express, Axios, PostgreSQL, Massive, Bcrypt.js, Sass, Cloudinary, Git

Let's work on your next project!

×

Gift Away | Group Project

about this website / app

GiftAway ( Group project ) - Gift Away is donation website that helps users to give away their unused or unwanted items. While donors can easily share their stuff, donation receivers can view the donated products and chat live with the donors to schedule a time and place to picking up donations.

Technologies: React, Redux, Node, Git, Axios, Express, PostgreSQL, Massive, Bcrypt.js, Sass, Cloudinary, Bootstrap, Socket.io

Let's work on your next project!
